page.title: 04Cottesmore Village
page.content: I live at Westland Road in Cottesmore village.Rachel lives near me and our door numbers are 23 and 31.There are three roads on our estate and they are Westland Road,Nether Close and Long Meadow Way.Rachel's daddy has just made an extension.Rachel plays with me on the black circle out side her house.There are lots of children where we live and there is one play park but there is not much to do there.We have an ice-cream man who comes round and he is called Mr Softi,his real name is Malcolm and he comes every day except Monday.We get our ice-cream on Sundays My favourite ice-cream is a Big Feast There is another ice-cream man who comes round sometimes and if you tell him that Mr Softi has been he will give you an ice-cream free. There is lots of woodland and we have a lovely view of a field where we play.
